chunk:
Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Facial Mask

Brand: Shea Moisture

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Deionized Water, Kaolin Clay, Bentonile Clay, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Simmondia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Stearyl Alcohol (Coconut Oil), Cety Alcohol (Coconut Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)*, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Butyl Avocadate (Av

Butyl Avocadate (Avocado), Aloe Barbadensis Leal Extract*, Glycerin, Phytosterols, Hibiscus Sabdaritta (Hibiscus) Extract, Panrthenol (Pro-Vitamin B-5), Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Bisabolol (Chamomile), Dehydroacetic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Allantoin (Comfrey Root Extract), Papoin (Papaya) Extract, Songyi Mushroom Extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH:
ient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
